original: 荊州人，蜀漢將領。劉備入蜀前即已在其麾下，益州平定後被任為江陽太守。曾向諸葛亮舉薦蔣琬為茂才。官至監軍後將軍。
text: Jingzhou people, Shuhan generals. Liu Bei was under his command before he entered Shu, and after Yizhou was settled, he was appointed as Jiangyang prefect. Once recommended to Zhuge Liang Jiang Wan as Maocai. General after the official to the prison army.
